.. _command-line-tools:

Command-Line Tools
==================

Command-line tools that can be run offline, provided to give all the input/output information.

Tools to create calibration files
*********************************

Tools to produce all types of camera calibration files.

They do not handle the interaction with the calibration database.


   .. toctree::
      :titlesonly:
      :maxdepth: 1

      create_drs4_pedestal_file
      create_drs4_time_file
      extract_drs4_timelapse_data
      aggregate_drs4_timelapse_data
      create_drs4_timelapse_file
      create_calibration_file
      create_cat_b_calibration_file
      create_fit_intensity_scan_file
